## Introduction

This report explores historical temperature trends in selected major U.S. cities from 1913 to the present. The data is derived from the [Global Land Temperatures by City](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/berkeleyearth/climate-change-earth-surface-temperature-data) dataset.
